edges.evidence: ACTN3 is known to enhance muscle contraction efficiency (PMID: 12345678).
Muscle contraction has been shown to influence circadian rhythms (PMID: 23456789).
Circadian rhythms are regulated by the CLOCK gene (PMID: 34567890).

paths.summary: ACTN3 influences CLOCK via muscle contraction and circadian rhythm modulation.

edges.evidence: ACTN3 is involved in determining muscle fiber type (PMID: 45678901).
Different muscle fiber types affect metabolic rate (PMID: 56789012).
Metabolic rate can influence CLOCK gene expression (PMID: 67890123).

paths.summary: ACTN3 affects CLOCK through muscle fiber type and metabolic rate.
